414860.name: Robotpencil Presents: Painting with Confidence
414860.description:
This video is going to cover my thoughts on how to have more confident Strokes, Cross Hatching, and Edges. It will also talk about how my images look effortless, and the process in which I do it. Thanks for the support and GOOD LUCK!

Files Included

  • HiRes JPEG and PSD
  • Tool Presets
  • Bonus PSD

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
